Expand Your Expertise With The CE Shop

Our award-winning curriculum was designed with your long-term success in mind. Whether you’re just starting your career or you’ve been in the business for decades, we’ll help you take your expertise to the next level with our educational offerings:

Real Estate

Give your career a boost with The CE Shop. We offer Pre-Licensing, Exam Prep, Post-Licensing, and Continuing Education, with online courses available in all 50 states and D.C.

Mortgage

The CE Shop’s NMLS-approved Pre-Licensure and Continuing Education courses, along with our interactive Exam Prep Edge study program, offer an innovative and results-driven online learning experience.

Home Inspection

Whether you’re looking to start a career in home inspection or you’re a home inspector looking to add services and develop new skills, The CE Shop is proud to offer both online and in-person courses through American Home Inspectors Training.
